Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the license application requirements for general and food street vendors and to repeal paragraph 7 of subdivision b of section 17-309 and paragraph 6 of subdivision b of section 20-455 of the administrative code of the city of New York.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: License application requirements for general and food street vendors.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to disclosure in advertising with respect to theatre show times.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Disclosure in advertising with respect to theatre show times.

Items.Title: Oversight - Movie Showtime Advertising
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Oversight - Movie Showtime Advertising
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the license application requirements for general and food street vendors and to repeal paragraph 7 of subdivision b of section 17-309 and paragraph 6 of subdivision b of section 20-455 of the administrative code of the city of New York.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the license application requirements for general and food street vendors and to repeal paragraph 7 of subdivision b of section 17-309 and paragraph 6 of subdivision b of section 20-455 of the administrative code of the city of New York.
